cli.view

Class CLIView

  • java.lang.Object
    • cli.view.CLIView

  • public class CLIView
extends java.lang.Object
    Class designed to display a menu for the user to enter their input, and display the result of their query.

    Only called when the app is used in CLI mode.

    Author:
    aserre

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CLIView() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void cliResultView(CLICommand cli)
      Displays the result of a command once it has been parsed.
      static java.lang.String homeView()
      Displays the main menu and reads the input of the user.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Infinite loop used to call the main menu, parse the input of the user and display the result of their request.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
